[Home](./index.md) &gt; [eth-connect](./eth-connect.md) &gt; [BigNumber](./eth-connect.bignumber.md) &gt; [isEqualTo](./eth-connect.bignumber.isequalto.md)

## BigNumber.isEqualTo() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is equal to the value of `n`<!-- -->, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

As with JavaScript, `NaN` does not equal `NaN`<!-- -->.

```ts
0 === 1e-324                           // true
x = new BigNumber(0)
x.isEqualTo('1e-324')                  // false
BigNumber(-0).isEqualTo(x)             // true  ( -0 === 0 )
BigNumber(255).isEqualTo('ff', 16)     // true

y = new BigNumber(NaN)
y.isEqualTo(NaN)                // false
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEqualTo(n: BigNumber.Value, base?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | [BigNumber.Value](./eth-connect.bignumber.value.md) | A numeric value. |
|  base | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The base of n. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
